idea-plugin.name: Yoshi's Island Progress Bar
idea-plugin.description:
This is the [Yoshi's Island Progress Bar](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/14708-mario-progress-bar/versions) for [JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) based on the Nyan Progress Bar by Dmitry Batkovitch. It displays Yoshi walking with a dirt block background for the basic bar, and a spinning penguin for indeterminate tasks.
